# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drills have no fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drills have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the mining operation.

### Errors when stone furnaces have no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to start the smelting operation.

### Errors when burner inserters have no fuel
- Ensure that the burner inserters have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the inserting operation.

### Errors when steam engines are not connected
- Ensure that the steam engines are properly connected to the boiler and the electricity network.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that the pipe groups are properly connected to the offshore pump and the boiler.

### Errors when electricity groups are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that the electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
